subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roy Halladay’s earned run average, after two starts, is 14.73 and his velocity is down, as it was last season and this spring. But Halladay insists all of this is a mental issue that he must work through.
snippet: Roy Halladay’s earned run average, after two starts, is 14.73 and his velocity is down, as it was last season and this spring. But Halladay insists all of this is a mental issue that he must work through.
